FuncDef: This command specifies the pre-download time for next-update-based update.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time period, in days, prior to the next update time of the current CRL. Values-0 to 366.
Specifies the time period, in hours, prior to the next update time of the current CRL. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the time period, in minutes, prior to the next update time of the current CRL. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the time period, in seconds, prior to the next update time of the current CRL. Values-0 to 59.
